item.Q:
Write the character: yuàn

courtyard; institution
国务院 (國務院) guówùyuàn State Department (USA); State Council (China)

traditional: 三國演義
Sānguóyǎnyì Romance of the Three Kingdoms, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature; a fictional account of the Three Kingdoms at the break-up of the Han around 200 AD, consistently portraying Liu Bei's Shu Han 劉備, 蜀漢|刘备, 蜀汉 as virtuous heroes and Cao Cao's Wei 曹操, 魏 as tyrannical villains
sānguóyǎnyì Romance of the Three Kingdoms
shàngyǎn to screen (a movie); to stage (a play); a screening; a staging
gōngyǎn to perform (e.g. on the stage); to lecture
fǎnyǎn inversion (geometry)
yǎnchū to act (in a play); to perform; to put on (a performance)
yǎnhuà evolution
yǎnsuàn to calculate; to perform calculations

traditional: 演義
yǎnyì to dramatize historical events; novel or play on historical theme

yǎnshuō (deliver a) speech

traditional: 演講
